搲字的基本解释

搲
wā
手捉物。

搲
wǎ
爬：“余挟二樵子从壑底搲而上。”
方言，舀：用瓢搲水。用碗在坛里搲米。

搲
wà
挽。

搲字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wā］
［《集韻》烏化切，平麻，影。］
［《廣韻》烏瓦切，上馬，影。］
亦作“攨1”。
以手或器皿取物。
[②]［wà］
［《集韻》烏化切，去禡，影。］
亦作“攨2”。
牵挽。

搲字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　搲； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页448第12
【集韻】烏瓜切，音蛙。手捉物也。又【類篇】烏瓦切。吳俗謂手爬物曰搲。　又【集韻】烏化切。吳人謂牽挽曰搲。或作攨。

搲字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
搲字的起名意思

暂无。

Squeeze
Basic explanation of words
Squeeze
wā
Catch something.
Squeeze
wǎ
Climbing: "I took the two woodsmen up from the bottom of the gully."
Dialect, scoop: Use a scoop to scoop water. Mix the rice in the jar with a bowl.
Squeeze
wà
pull.
Squeeze
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wā］
["Ji Yun" Wuhua cut, plain hemp, shadow. ]
["Guangyun" Uvache, on horse, shadow. ]
Also known as "攨1".
Take things with hands or utensils.
[②]［wà］
["Jiyun" Wuhua cuts, goes to 禡, shadows. ]
Also known as "攨2".
Pull.
Squeeze
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Collection] [Hand Character Department] 　搲; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 448-12
[Ji Yun] Wugua cut, sound frog. Hand catching things too. Also 【Classes】Uvache. Wu Su said that hand-climbing things called 搲.　[Jiyun] Wuhuaqie. The people of Wu said that they would pull in and call out. Or make a fool.
Squeeze
